examplePhrases: Alexa ask my dayghter to wash her hands
Alexa tell my daughter to be a good girl
en-US.name: My Daughter
en-US.description:
Ask your daughters to be nice. Say "Alexa, ask my daugher to be a good girl" or "Alexa, ask my daughter to wash her hands" to acheive your goal".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
